import React, { Component } from "react"; import "./App.css"; import {getAllBooks} from './Api'; import Card from "./components/Card"; import Movelist from "./components/Movelist"; export default class App extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state={title:"",author:"",shelf:"",imglink:"",booksArr:""} const booksArr=getAllBooks(); } componentDidMount() { this.setState({title:'Amal'}) //console.log(getAllBooks()) // getAllBooks().then(res =>console.log(res)) getAllBooks().then(res =>console.log(res)) console.log(getAllBooks()) this.setState({booksArr:getAllBooks()}) /console.log('type of'+booksArr) } render() { return (
